net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.discovery

Class DiscoveryThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.discovery.DiscoveryThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DiscoveryThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This Thread is used by the RakNetClient to discover servers, allowing the client to discover servers without being started and without having to take up multiple threads.
    Author:
    Trent "MarfGamer" Summerlin

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getClients

        public RakNetClient[] getClients()
        Returns:
        the clients that are currently using the discovery system.

      • addClient

        public void addClient(RakNetClient client)
        Adds a RakNetClient to the discovery system so it can discover servers.
        Parameters:
        client - the RakNetClient enabling its discovery system.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(RakNetClient client)
        Removes a RakNetClient from the discovery system, this method is also called automatically by the client when it is garbage collected.
        Parameters:
        client - the RakNetClient disabling its discovery system.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the thread has been started.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the discovery system.
